items.details:
Upcoming Tests

Tuesday January 20th - Vocabulary Workshop Unit 1-9
Tuesday Januart 20th - Grammar Worshop - Unit 3 (Verbs)

Reading update

There is no reading homework from our textbooks at the moment, so I expect students to complete their reading through ReadWorks instead. This ensures everyone is still practicing reading regularly.

Please make sure students are logging into ReadWorks and completing the assigned stories. I have added new passages, including one about the Titanic and another on the three branches of government, which link closely to our class learning.

Students should also read the books they borrowed from the library today and complete AR quizzes for those books once finished.

How to log in:

Go to www.readworks.org/student

Class code: YU6GQ2

Password: [REDACTED] (unless already changed)

Thank you for your continued support.

Math

Complete Additional Practice 8-5 student book and homework book.

I have added New Khan Academy lessons related to data.

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night
 at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Science  (Tomorrow)

Read and complete pages 142-147

Complete the climate change worksheet.

Watch the videos about climate change to embed knowledge

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WkvPdUtYhX8
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tykLKCT7DyY  

Social Studies

Read and complete pages 150-155

Watch the videos about the 3 branches of government to embed knowledge

Language Arts

Complete pages 110-111 in the grammar workshop book
